resources.string:
This is a demo application for Feedback, a lightweight library which provides a ready-to-use Material-ized UI for collecting user feedbacks from within an existing app. 
 Unlike other similar libraries, Feedback allows you to capture a screenshot of the current activity, which you may manipulate in your callbacks. 

 Use the menu to provide feedback. 

 Please navigate to http://github.com/MariusVolkhart/Feedback for further instructions.
